meanings.sent1: The omnium of toys in the playroom delighted the children.
meanings.sent2: She organized an omnium of books on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The omnium of snacks in the pantry made her feel like a queen.
meanings.sent4: His room was an omnium of gadgets and gizmos.
meanings.sent5: The omnium of stars in the night sky took her breath away.

meanings.definition: A group or combination of all elements.
meanings.sent1: The omnium of students in the classroom was diverse.
meanings.sent2: The omnium of colors in the painting created a beautiful masterpiece.
meanings.sent3: The omnium of animals at the zoo amazed the visitors.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was an omnium of laughter and joy.
meanings.sent5: The omnium of ingredients in the recipe made it delicious.
